mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.society_level AS "societyLevel", a.society_score_min AS "societyScoreMin", a.society_score_max AS "societyScoreMax", a.culture_level AS "cultureLevel", a.culture_score_min AS "cultureScoreMin", a.culture_score_max AS "cultureScoreMax", a.expression AS "expression", a.matrix AS "matrix", a.economy_level AS "economyLevel", a.economy_score_min AS "economyScoreMin", a.economy_score_max AS "economyScoreMax", a.description AS "description", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by
mapper.select: SELECT ((economy_score_min+economy_score_max)/2.0)*0.01 as economy, ((society_score_min+society_score_max)/2.0)*0.01 as society, ((culture_score_min+culture_score_max)/2.0)*0.01 as culture FROM mod_hierarchy a WHERE a.id = #{hierarchyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_hierarchy( id, name, society_level, society_score_min, society_score_max, culture_level, culture_score_min, culture_score_max, expression, matrix, economy_level, economy_score_min, economy_score_max, description, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{societyLevel}, #{societyScoreMin}, #{societyScoreMax}, #{cultureLevel}, #{cultureScoreMin}, #{cultureScoreMax}, #{expression}, #{matrix}, #{economyLevel}, #{economyScoreMin}, #{economyScoreMax}, #{description}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_hierarchy SET name = #{name}, society_level = #{societyLevel}, society_score_min = #{societyScoreMin}, society_score_max = #{societyScoreMax}, culture_level = #{cultureLevel}, culture_score_min = #{cultureScoreMin}, culture_score_max = #{cultureScoreMax}, expression = #{expression}, matrix = #{matrix}, economy_level = #{economyLevel}, economy_score_min = #{economyScoreMin}, economy_score_max = #{economyScoreMax}, description = #{description}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
